Hotel.name: Crown Paradise Club Cancun All Inclusive

Description.Text: All meals and snacks daily: 24-hour food service. Unlimited consumption of domestic and imported drinks (imported brands are: scotch, gin, brandy and vodka). Room service available 24 hours. Live entertainment, nightly shows in the theater.Daily activities: aerobics, bicycles, table tennis, tennis, volleyball, basketball, bingo, billiards, shuffleboards, table games. Non-motorized water sports: introduction to scuba in pool, snorkeling demos. Activities in Marina: Sailing, windsurfing, kayaks, pedal boats and equipment based on availability. Daily shuttles to marina, located at Marina Aqua world. Mini Club: Kid s club with supervised activities for children between 4-12yrs. of age. Baby Club: Featuring supervised activities for infants between 18 months - 3 years of age.
Located in the Zona Hotelera of Cancun

One queen size bed or two beds, cable color television with satellite and On Demand movies, air conditioning, telephone with voicemail, coffee maker, full bathroom with shower and bathtub, makeup mirror, hairdryer, in-room safety deposit box, clock radio, iron and ironing board
The hotel is modern in style

From the finest cuisine served in the most elegant setting to casual poolside snacks. Crown Paradise Club Cancun boasts a wide range of Succulent dishes bringing together flavors of the most famous gastronomes of the world to tantalize temp and satisfy the client. Among many choices are authentic Chinese and Japanese, Mexican, French and Italian to delight any palate.
The lobby is big in size, a quite big open space, offer a comfortable area for all guests from the moment they arrive early or depart late from the hotel.
